name: Build 'n Bump
description: Build 'n Bump is a local multiplayer, 2D head-stomping brawler where you build your own levels right before you play on them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 85 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Gets old fast. Got in a bundle for pennies, and not sure I felt the hour and a half or so I played really interested me or if it was just getting the chieves.
simple easy and fun exactly what i expected :)
